column5: All right!  I finally have 2 days to myself this weekend (first all year) and am going to spend it on the lake.  I really want to try and practice my drop shot technique for smallies and perch.  Any tips?  Fishing the east end, Mohawk Point, Port Maitland.

Hey pete been told there's perch in 64 fow.  We were there last week end but couldn't get any minnows.  Tried worms & small plastics but no luck.  Make sure u have minnows if u want Lake Erie perch. Good luck

Sunday is looking good wind wise. Try shallow 10 to 15 FOW in the morning or if there is a good chop.Move deeper midday. 20 to 30 FOW. Tubes and Drop shot have been working well. Try jerk baits in the shallows also.I will be out all weekend to the west Mohawk Point.

Hit Tecumseh Reef if you can...massive reef . Hard to pick apart but its like eating an elephant.. one bite at a time. If you do email me and tell me how you did. i am just learning the area as well.    Darren

Haven't been out myself in TOO LONG...was hoping for Saturday but that doesn't look too good.......but here's some info that might help....  http://www.buffalonews.com/apps/pbcs.dll/article?AID=/20120911/SPORTS/120919727
